Name: House Cleaning Survival
About the game: 'House Cleaning Survival' is a satisfying cleaning simulation game. One day, our freshly unemployed main protagonist receives a message from a strange character, asking for...house cleaning? Complete cleaning orders to pay off your debt! Use all-powerful special cleaning equipment to conquer all filth!! - simple controls for fun cleaning! - many 'unique' and 'special' rooms wait for your makeover! - an intriguing story illustrated through casual conversation
